data.name: Socialize: 2023
data.detailed_description:
Join us on discord


About the Game





Discover Prosperity, a huge island of 4*4km with its beautiful cities and countryside full of opportunities!

There is a lot of ways to explore prosperity:

  • Take a walk in our cities to make some shopping, or simply talk with the other players around
  • Go on a road trip with your car or bike and explore the countryside
  • Enjoy the view from our unique aerial subway



Socialize is a non-linear, multiplayer role-playing game, where we give you the tools to find your own ways of making money, you can for example :

  • Gather resources and sell them "as-is"
  • Transform your resources into more valuable products and sell them to shops or other players
  • Sell your services (car driving, protection, anything you can think of) to other players
  • Enroll yourself in the Police forces to fight against criminals
  • Try to become rich doing illegal activities (sell drugs, become a hitman, take hostages)



Socialize is not just another generic MMORPG like we always see. We don't have a mega server, with all the players having the same experience. Instead, we give you the tools to create your own role-playing server and join unique communities with their own vision of what roleplaying should be!



Use our awesome server manager panel to customize and manage your roleplay server easily. Here are some examples of the things you can do with our server manager panel :

  • Create your own items and resources for your server
  • Manage your players (give, ban, kick, all the moderation tools you need)
  • Create your own licenses (for vehicles, processing, shops, whatever)
  • Create your own shops (vehicles, items, food, create any kind of shop), and set your own buy and sell prices
  • Manage your server config (configure day time, salaries, items and cash, and much more ..)

data.short_description: If you're a fan of Altis life, DarkRP, GTAV RP and more, Socialize is the multiplayer role-playing game you've been waiting for! Join a unique community that will fit your vision of roleplaying in this endless living world and write your own story with no limits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: It's a multiplayer roleplaying game, with gun fights. Players can talk and kill each other.
